misconfiguration.description: In order to perform this kind of attack: - ftp IP PORT - Try to login with username: anonymous
In order to perform this kind of attack: - ftp [IP] [PORT] - Try to login with username: anonymous

sqlmap is an open source penetration testing tool that automates the process of detecting and exploiting SQL injection flaws and taking over of database servers. In order to perform this kind of attack: - sqlmap -u [URL] --batch

Username guessing tool primarily for use against the default Solaris SMTP service. Can use either EXPN, VRFY or RCPT TO. In order to perform this kind of attack: - smtp-user-enum -M VRFY -u [USER] -t [IP]

DIRB is a Web Content Scanner. It looks for existing (and/or hidden) Web Objects.It basically works by launching a dictionary based attack against a web server and analyzing the responses. In order to perform this kind of attack: - dirb http://[IP]/ [wordlist file] - Wordlist file in Kali has stored in /usr/share/wordlists/dirb/

Gobuster is an aggressive scanner that helps you find hidden Directories, URLs, Sub-Domains,and S3 Buckets seamlessly. In order to perform this kind of attack: - gobuster dir -u [url] -w [wordlist file] - Wordlist file in Kali has stored in /usr/share/wordlists/dirb/

fuf is a fest web fuzzer written in Go that allows typical directory discovery, virtual host discovery (without DNS records), GET and POST parameter fuzzing. In order to perform this kind of attack: - ffuf -w [wordlist file] -u https://[URL] -H [HOST]
